name: ikatech-solutions-client
description: client for the Ikatech Solutions admission test
author: Ignacio Cava

scripts.delete-husky: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); if (fs.existsSync('.husky')) { console.log('.husky file exists, deleting...'); execSync('rimraf .husky'); console.log('.husky file deleted'); } else { console.log('.husky file does not exist'); }"
scripts.husky-setup: husky install && npx husky add .husky/pre-commit "npx lint-staged" && npx husky add .husky/commit-msg "npx commitlint --edit ${1}"
scripts.check-husky: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); try { execSync('husky --version', { stdio: 'ignore' }); console.log('husky is available'); execSync('pnpm run delete-husky && pnpm run husky-setup', { stdio: 'inherit' }); } catch (error) { console.log('husky is not available'); }"
